description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国副总统、行政院院长、中国国民党主席等职。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who has served as Vice President of the Republic of China, Premier of the Executive Yuan, and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Wu Den-yih.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义的父亲，二二八事件后的清乡运动受难者。
description.en: Father of Wu Den-yih, a victim of the Village-Cleaning Campaign after the February 28 incident.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，吴敦义在其任内担任行政院院长及副总统。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. Wu Den-yih served as Premier and Vice President during his presidency.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的主要政党之一，吴敦义长期为其党员并曾担任党主席。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China. Wu Den-yih has been a long-term member and served as its chairman.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的顶尖研究型大学，吴敦义毕业于其历史学系。
description.en: A leading research university located in Taipei, Taiwan. Wu Den-yih graduated from its Department of History.

en: Vice President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家副元首职位。
description.en: The office of the Vice Head of State of the Republic of China.

en: Premier of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政首长职位。
description.en: The highest administrative chief position in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 高雄市的最高行政首长职位。
description.en: The highest administrative chief position in Kaohsiung City.

description.zh-cn: 南投县的最高行政首长职位。
description.en: The highest administrative chief position in Nantou County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国最高立法机关的成员。
description.en: A member of the highest legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台北市的最高立法机关。
description.en: The highest legislative body of Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。他曾接见并赏识年轻时的吴敦义。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. He met with and appreciated a young Wu Den-yih.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。他任命吴敦义为官派高雄市长，后又与其发生政治摩擦。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. He appointed Wu Den-yih as the government-appointed mayor of Kaohsiung, and later had political friction with him.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾与李登辉一同提拔吴敦义，后在2012年总统选举中成为吴敦义的竞争对手。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who, along with Lee Teng-hui, promoted Wu Den-yih. He later became Wu's rival in the 2012 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，在1998年高雄市长选举中击败寻求连任的吴敦义。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who defeated Wu Den-yih in the 1998 Kaohsiung mayoral election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，吴敦义的前任行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, Wu Den-yih's predecessor as Premier of the Executive Yuan.

nodes.id: 2020年中华民国总统副总统及立法委员选举

zh-cn: 2020年中华民国总统副总统及立法委员选举

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的一次全国性选举，国民党的失利导致时任党主席吴敦义引咎辞职。
description.en: A national election in the Republic of China, the Kuomintang's defeat led to the resignation of then-chairman Wu Den-yih.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治及商界人物，因其子未被吴敦义任命为副市长而与其交恶，并创造了“白贼义”这一绰号。
description.en: A Taiwanese political and business figure who had a falling out with Wu Den-yih after his son was not appointed deputy mayor, coining the nickname 'Liar Yi'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任高雄市长。吴敦义曾用不当言论暗讽其身材。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Mayor of Kaohsiung. Wu Den-yih once made inappropriate remarks alluding to her figure.

description.zh-cn: 台湾苗栗县竹南镇大埔里因征地引发的抗争事件。时任行政院长吴敦义的承诺被指跳票，使其声誉受损。
description.en: A protest event in Dapu, Zhunan, Miaoli County, Taiwan, caused by land expropriation. Then-Premier Wu Den-yih's promises were allegedly broken, damaging his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 台湾地方闻人，曾与吴敦义夫妇同游峇里岛而引发争议。
description.en: A local figure in Taiwan who caused controversy by traveling to Bali with Wu Den-yih and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任南投县长。曾与吴敦义夫妇同游峇里岛。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Magistrate of Nantou County. He traveled to Bali with Wu Den-yih and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，时任苗栗县长，为大埔事件中的关键人物。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, then Magistrate of Miaoli County, who was a key figure in the Dapu Incident.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾南投县的镇，是吴敦义的出生地。
description.en: A township in Nantou County, Taiwan, and the birthplace of Wu Den-yih.

description.zh-cn: 二二八事件后国民政府在台湾进行的绥靖、整肃和镇压行动，吴敦义之父吴奚在此期间被捕入狱。
description.en: A pacification, purge, and suppression campaign conducted by the Nationalist government in Taiwan after the February 28 Incident. Wu Den-yih's father, Wu Hsi, was arrested and imprisoned during this period.

description.zh-cn: 1947年发生于台湾的官民冲突事件，其后的清乡运动影响了吴敦义的家庭。
description.en: An anti-government uprising in Taiwan in 1947. The subsequent Village-Cleaning Campaign affected Wu Den-yih's family.

description.zh-cn: 重创台湾的台风，引发的救灾争议导致时任行政院长刘兆玄内阁总辞，由吴敦义接任。
description.en: A typhoon that severely impacted Taiwan. The controversy over disaster relief led to the resignation of the cabinet of then-Premier Liu Chao-shiuan, with Wu Den-yih taking over.

description.zh-cn: 由刘兆玄担任行政院院长期间的中华民国行政院团队。因八八水灾救灾不力总辞。
description.en: The Executive Yuan team of the Republic of China during Liu Chao-shiuan's tenure as Premier. The cabinet resigned en masse due to criticism of its handling of Typhoon Morakot relief efforts.

description.zh-cn: 民进党籍议员，在1998年高雄市长选举时，公布一卷后被证实为伪造的录音带，指控吴敦义有婚外情，影响了选举结果。
description.en: A DPP councilor who, during the 1998 Kaohsiung mayoral election, released a tape—later proven to be forged—alleging Wu Den-yih had an extramarital affair, which affected the election outcome.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台南市长。他曾称赞吴敦义为最有能力的行政院院长。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Mayor of Tainan. He once praised Wu Den-yih as a highly capable Premier.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义与蔡令怡是夫妻关系。
description.en: Wu Den-yih and Tsai Ling-yi are married.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义是吴奚的儿子。
description.en: Wu Den-yih is the son of Wu Hsi.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义是中国国民党籍的政治人物。
description.en: Wu Den-yih is a politician affiliated with the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义毕业于国立台湾大学历史学系。
description.en: Wu Den-yih graduated from the Department of History at National Taiwan University.

position.zh-cn: 官派第5任、民选第1届市长

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义在马英九总统任内，先后担任行政院院长与副总统。
description.en: Wu Den-yih served as Premier and then Vice President under President Ma Ying-jeou.

description.zh-cn: 马英九先后任命吴敦义为行政院院长，并提名其为副总统候选人搭档参选。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou appointed Wu Den-yih as Premier and later nominated him as his Vice Presidential running mate.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国在吴敦义年轻时曾接见并赏识他，对其政治生涯早期发展有重要影响。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo met with and appreciated Wu Den-yih in his youth, significantly influencing his early political career.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统李登辉与国民党秘书长宋楚瑜一同提拔吴敦义，任命其为官派高雄市市长。
description.en: Then-President Lee Teng-hui, along with KMT Secretary-General James Soong, promoted Wu Den-yih by appointing him as the government-appointed mayor of Kaohsiung.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义在担任高雄市长期间曾批评李登辉政府“重北轻南”，后来又指李登辉时代是国民党黑金问题最严重的阶段。
description.en: During his tenure as Kaohsiung Mayor, Wu Den-yih criticized the Lee Teng-hui administration for 'prioritizing the north over the south' and later pointed to Lee's era as the most severe period of 'black gold' politics in the KMT.

description.zh-cn: 宋楚瑜作为亲民党候选人参加2012年中华民国总统选举，与代表国民党的吴敦义（副总统候选人）为竞争对手。
description.en: As the People First Party candidate in the 2012 ROC presidential election, James Soong was a rival to the KMT's Wu Den-yih (vice presidential candidate).

description.zh-cn: 在1998年高雄市市长选举中，谢长廷代表民进党参选，并击败了寻求连任的国民党籍市长吴敦义。
description.en: In the 1998 Kaohsiung mayoral election, Frank Hsieh represented the DPP and defeated the incumbent KMT mayor Wu Den-yih, who was seeking re-election.

description.zh-cn: 莫拉克台风（八八水灾）重创台湾，因救灾表现引发民众不满，导致刘兆玄内阁总辞。
description.en: Typhoon Morakot caused severe damage in Taiwan, and public dissatisfaction with the disaster response led to the mass resignation of the Liu Chao-shiuan cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 吴敦义接替因八八水灾辞职的刘兆玄，担任行政院院长。
description.en: Wu Den-yih succeeded Liu Chao-shiuan, who resigned over Typhoon Morakot, as the Premier of the Executive Yuan.

relationships.source: 2020年中华民国总统副总统及立法委员选举

description.zh-cn: 因国民党在2020年总统及立委选举中败选，时任党主席吴敦义宣布承担责任并辞去职务。
description.en: Due to the KMT's defeat in the 2020 presidential and legislative elections, then-Chairman Wu Den-yih announced he would take responsibility and resign from his post.

description.zh-cn: 因吴敦义未按承诺任命其子王志雄为副市长，王玉云公开痛骂吴敦义为“白贼义”，两人从此交恶。
description.en: Because Wu Den-yih did not appoint his son Wang Chih-hsiung as deputy mayor as promised, Wang Yu-yun publicly denounced Wu as 'Liar Yi', and the two became enemies.

description.zh-cn: 在2018年为韩国瑜辅选时，吴敦义使用“肥滋滋”、“大母猪”等词语暗讽陈菊的身材，引发争议。
description.en: While campaigning for Han Kuo-yu in 2018, Wu Den-yih used terms like 'fatty' and 'big sow' to allude to Chen Chu's figure, causing controversy.

description.zh-cn: 时任行政院长吴敦义曾就大埔征地案承诺原屋保留，但承诺最终跳票，强拆继续进行，使其声誉受到严重损害。
description.en: Then-Premier Wu Den-yih promised to preserve the original houses in the Dapu land expropriation case, but the promise was ultimately broken and demolitions proceeded, severely damaging his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 时任苗栗县长刘政鸿是主导大埔征地与强拆的关键人物。
description.en: Then-Miaoli County Magistrate Liu Cheng-hung was the key figure leading the land expropriation and forced demolitions in the Dapu Incident.

description.zh-cn: 2008年，吴敦义与妻子受朋友邀请，与中台湾闻人江钦良共赴峇里岛旅游。
description.en: In 2008, Wu Den-yih and his wife, at a friend's invitation, traveled to Bali with Central Taiwan figure Jiang Chin-liang.

description.zh-cn: 2008年，吴敦义与妻子受朋友邀请，与时任南投县长李朝卿夫妇共赴峇里岛旅游。
description.en: In 2008, Wu Den-yih and his wife, at a friend's invitation, traveled to Bali with then-Nantou County Magistrate Lee Chao-ching and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 二二八事件之后，国民政府在台湾展开了“清乡”运动。
description.en: Following the February 28 Incident, the Nationalist government launched the 'Village-Cleaning Campaign' in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 在二二八事件后的清乡运动中，吴敦义的父亲吴奚被罗织罪名，遭逮捕并续押近三年。
description.en: During the Village-Cleaning Campaign after the February 28 Incident, Wu Den-yih's father, Wu Hsi, was framed, arrested, and detained for nearly three years.

description.zh-cn: 在1998年高雄市长选举期间，民进党籍议员陈春生公布一卷后被证实为伪造的录音带，诬指吴敦义有婚外情，对吴敦义的选情造成负面影响。
description.en: During the 1998 Kaohsiung mayoral election, DPP councilor Chen Chun-sheng released a tape, later proven to be forged, which falsely accused Wu Den-yih of having an extramarital affair, negatively impacting his campaign.

description.zh-cn: 时任台南市长赖清德曾称赞吴敦义为最有能力的行政院院长。
description.en: Then-Tainan Mayor Lai Ching-te once praised Wu Den-yih as a highly capable Premier.
